scripts.bootstrap-nix: yarn && spago init && spago install behaviors drawing web-html && yarn add parcel-plugin-static-files-copy --dev && yarn2nix > yarn.nix && spago2nix generate
scripts.full-clean: rm -rf node_modules output .spago dist/* *.lock spago-packages.nix yarn.nix .spago2nix .cache spago.dhall packages.dhall
scripts.bundle: spago bundle-app --main ReceptiveField.Main --to dist/app.js && parcel build assets/*.html
